=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/04/22 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Francis Lawrence'], 'Producers': ['Nina Jacobson', 'Jon Kilik'], 'Starring': ['Jennifer Lawrence', 'Josh Hutcherson', 'Liam Hemsworth'], 'Studio': ['SciFi and Fantasy']} Review Text: I didn't like this one as much since it seems like Jennifer's angst over being in the games were a little over done. I get it, she didn't want to be there - like the rest of them - but her whining did get on my nerves after a while. I do hope the next movie will be better. Pot', 'James Hanlon', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Diana Valentine', 'Frank Military', 'Tawnia McKiernan'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Review Text: Great season to a great show. Gets more into the relationship of Jo and Callen - won't say anymore than that. Also it builds on the Deeks relationship with Kensi. All in all a great season. Can't wait for Season 8! Review Title: Excellent Season To Date Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/06/29 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['Norsk Bokmål'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Roar Uthaug'], 'Producers': ['Martin Sundland', 'Are Heidenstrøm'], 'Starring': ['Kristoffer Joner', 'Ane Dahl Torp', 'Jonas Hoff Oftebro']} Review Text: Incredible movie! Yes it has subtitles but it's well worth the read. Hollywood should take notes on how to make a disaster movie without all the unbelievable nonsense they LOVE to add in...

Great movie with characters I actually cared about - wow - what a rarity these days in Hollywood. Review Title: Awesome Movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bigfoot Vs. Zombies Review Date: 2016/07/08 Categories: Science Fiction, Suspense, Comedy, Horror Product Description: ['A scientist creates a toxic cocktail that slowly leaks into the local population, creating flesh-eating zombies - and only one creature of legend can stop the growing hordes of the undead.'] Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Polonia'], 'Producers': ['Rob Hauschild']} Review Text: I have seen a lot of movies that some would call extraordinarily bad. But alas, this one does not measure up to any of those. The spectacular Bigfoot gorilla suit...er...I mean, make-up, was outstanding. The zombies were obviously trained by the best acting coaches that Hollywood had to offer. Every "Errr" was pronounced with depth, every "Arrrg" was breathtakingly realistic. The last time I heard such agonizing sounds was when I slipped in my shower...

And the humans - well - they left me as speechless as the stumbling zombies. Even with minimal dialog and plots that kept me on the edge of my seat. This brought back memories of the time I was hiking on Kauai, and almost slipped off a cliff in the rainstorm. Meaning, I had no idea if I would live through the next devastating twist...

Bigfoot Vs. Zombies - a movie that I would highly recommend to anyone seeking a movie to watch while you're waiting for a meteor to strike the earth... Review Title: Incredible! Delivery was fast and the product was undamaged. Review Title: Perfect! Creepy in its own right and great twist at the end. I'll certainly watch it again. Review Title: Great Movie! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cosmos - War Of The Planets (1977) Review Date: 2016/07/25 Categories: Science Fiction, Adventure Product Description: ['A strange signal arrives on the Earth disturbing all communications, while an ufo appears above the Antarctic sea.'] Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Alfonso Brescia'], 'Producers': ['Luigi Alessi', 'Doro Vlado Hreljanovic'], 'Starring': ['John Richardson', 'Yanti Sommer']} Review Text: Um...yah...not much to say really...lol! Oh wait! I liked the helmets... Review Title: Great Helmets... Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/08/09 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['The Snygg Brothers'], 'Producers': ['The Snygg Brothers'], 'Starring': ['Peter Sullivan', 'Marisol Custodio', 'John Fedele'], 'Studio': ["Uncork'd Entertainment"]} Review Text: This special effects of this movie had me on the edge of my seat!

I couldn't believe how realistic a gigantic-marionette-zombie rabbit could look. This film has left me so scarred that I will never celebrate Easter ever again. Even looking at pictures of colored eggs leaves me shivering and almost catatonic!

When the movie was over, I released all of your rabbits into the wild and was overwhelmed with joy when eagles appeared out of nowhere and protected me by taking them all away.

I should have never watched this. Beware the rabbits - they - are - everywhere... Review Title: Oh the blood...the horror of it all... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/08/22 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Olga Valanos'], 'Starring': ['Russel Means'], 'Studio': ['Syndicado']} Review Text: Most people think that Tribes have it made because they 1) Own Casinos 2) Get free government money 3) Get free homes.

They don't realize that Tribes are the ONLY race of people that have NO rights and NO equality in the United States. It's disgusting.

Watch this movie and educate yourselves BEFORE you open your mouth to tell us how we "got it made." Review Title: Watch The Truth Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/11/06 Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Michael Chuah'], 'Producers': ['Michael Chuah', 'Oliver Jeyrald Lee'], 'Starring': ['Amber Chia', 'Juin Juin Leong', 'Vick Teo'], 'Studio': ['Midnight Pulp']} Review Text: This movie was slow...it began slow...it stayed slow and it ended slow.

It was incredibly hard to get through because it was so slow. I kept finding my mind wandering but I refused to fast forward the movie like I usually do to movies of this caliber. The shots were too long, the angles rough and the 'jump factor' was too mild to be considered 'scary'.

All in all it was a horrible movie that I would never recommend to anyone - unless of course you have a TON of time to waste and absolutely nothing else to do. Review Title: I Watched It Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/09/25 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Casey Nolan'], 'Producers': ['Casey Nolan'], 'Starring': ['Casey Nolan', 'Tanner McBride'], 'Studio': ['MindSeed Productions']} Review Text: I actually watched the entire movie. Most of it is silly. I hate it when the so-called paranormal experts use a voice-box and struggle to make sense of the string of words. They ALL do it and that's just stupid. And the over-acting and "real" footage was a waste of time. At least it's not as bad as Ghost Adventures - thus I gave them 2 stars. If you have time to waste like I did, great. If you're looking for a movie of substance - forget it, you're not going to find it in this movie. Review Title: Time Wasted Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: These Final Hours Review Date: 2020/11/01 Categories: Science Fiction, Suspense, Serious, Tense Product Description: ['A self-obsessed young man makes his way to the party-to-end-all-parties on the last day on Earth, but ends up saving the life of a little girl searching for her father. Their relationship ultimately leads him on the path to redemption.'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zak Hilditch'], 'Producers': ['Liz Kearney'], 'Starring': ['Nathan Phillips', 'Angourie Rice', 'Jessica De Gouw']} Review Text: I really enjoyed it a lot. This movie gives you a lot to think about when it's over. I think most people won't like this movie because it doesn't have a happy ending, but the fact is, in real life, REAL happy endings are few and far between.

This is exactly what it would be like if we were hit like this. Scary, yes, depressing, yes, but it is true to life so there you have it. Well done. Review Title: Incredible movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/26 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John Stephenson'], 'Producers': ['Hannah Leader', 'Tom Newman', 'Andre Relis'], 'Starring': ['Hans Matheson', 'Samantha Barks', 'Lesley Manville'], 'Studio': ['Samuel Goldwyn Films']} Review Text: Very nice movie to spend time watching. The plot is great and so are the actors except for Susan Boyle. She needs to stick to singing and leave the acting to those that can. Overall a good movie for the holidays. Review Title: Terrible Movie Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Tomorrow War Review Date: 2021/07/17 Categories: Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Frightening Product Description: ['Time travelers arrive from 2051 to deliver an urgent message: 30 years in the future mankind is losing a war against a deadly alien species. Simmons', 'Yvonne Strahovski']} Review Text: After reading all the negative reviews I wanted to watch the movie for myself and I'm SO glad I did. It was a lotta fun and yes, it's like other movies, for instance - parts of it reminded me of World War Z - but I actually enjoyed it! I've seen a LOT of bad movies recently here on Prime but this movie wasn't one of them.

Glad I saw it and will recommend it to friends if they're up for a fun movie night. Review Title: Fun Movie! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/04/22 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Francis Lawrence'], 'Producers': ['Nina Jacobson', 'Jon Kilik'], 'Starring': ['Jennifer Lawrence', 'Josh Hutcherson', 'Liam Hemsworth'], 'Studio': ['SciFi and Fantasy']} Review Text: I didn't like this one as much since it seems like Jennifer's angst over being in the games were a little over done. I get it, she didn't want to be there - like the rest of them - but her whining did get on my nerves after a while. I do hope the next movie will be better. Gets more into the relationship of Jo and Callen - won't say anymore than that. Also it builds on the Deeks relationship with Kensi. All in all a great season. Can't wait for Season 8! Review Title: Excellent Season To Date Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/06/29 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['Norsk Bokmål'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Roar Uthaug'], 'Producers': ['Martin Sundland', 'Are Heidenstrøm'], 'Starring': ['Kristoffer Joner', 'Ane Dahl Torp', 'Jonas Hoff Oftebro']} Review Text: Incredible movie! Yes it has subtitles but it's well worth the read. Hollywood should take notes on how to make a disaster movie without all the unbelievable nonsense they LOVE to add in...

Review Title: Awesome Movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bigfoot Vs. Zombies Review Date: 2016/07/08 Categories: Science Fiction, Suspense, Comedy, Horror Product Description: ['A scientist creates a toxic cocktail that slowly leaks into the local population, creating flesh-eating zombies - and only one creature of legend can stop the growing hordes of the undead.'] Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Polonia'], 'Producers': ['Rob Hauschild']} Review Text: I have seen a lot of movies that some would call extraordinarily bad. But alas, this one does not measure up to any of those. The spectacular Bigfoot gorilla suit...er...I mean, make-up, was outstanding. The zombies were obviously trained by the best acting coaches that Hollywood had to offer. Every "Errr" was pronounced with depth, every "Arrrg" was breathtakingly realistic. The last time I heard such agonizing sounds was when I slipped in my shower...

And the humans - well - they left me as speechless as the stumbling zombies. Even with minimal dialog and plots that kept me on the edge of my seat. This brought back memories of the time I was hiking on Kauai, and almost slipped off a cliff in the rainstorm. Meaning, I had no idea if I would live through the next devastating twist...

Bigfoot Vs. Zombies - a movie that I would highly recommend to anyone seeking a movie to watch while you're waiting for a meteor to strike the earth... Review Title: Incredible! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/08/09 Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['The Snygg Brothers'], 'Producers': ['The Snygg Brothers'], 'Starring': ['Peter Sullivan', 'Marisol Custodio', 'John Fedele'], 'Studio': ["Uncork'd Entertainment"]} Review Text: This special effects of this movie had me on the edge of my seat!

I couldn't believe how realistic a gigantic-marionette-zombie rabbit could look. This film has left me so scarred that I will never celebrate Easter ever again. Even looking at pictures of colored eggs leaves me shivering and almost catatonic!

When the movie was over, I released all of your rabbits into the wild and was overwhelmed with joy when eagles appeared out of nowhere and protected me by taking them all away.

I should have never watched this. Beware the rabbits - they - are - everywhere... Review Title: Oh the blood...the horror of it all... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/08/22 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Olga Valanos'], 'Starring': ['Russel Means'], 'Studio': ['Syndicado']} Review Text: Most people think that Tribes have it made because they 1) Own Casinos 2) Get free government money 3) Get free homes.

They don't realize that Tribes are the ONLY race of people that have NO rights and NO equality in the United States. It's disgusting.

Watch this movie and educate yourselves BEFORE you open your mouth to tell us how we "got it made." Review Title: Watch The Truth Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/11/06 Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Michael Chuah'], 'Producers': ['Michael Chuah', 'Oliver Jeyrald Lee'], 'Starring': ['Amber Chia', 'Juin Juin Leong', 'Vick Teo'], 'Studio': ['Midnight Pulp']} Review Text: This movie was slow...it began slow...it stayed slow and it ended slow.

It was incredibly hard to get through because it was so slow. I kept finding my mind wandering but I refused to fast forward the movie like I usually do to movies of this caliber. The shots were too long, the angles rough and the 'jump factor' was too mild to be considered 'scary'.

All in all it was a horrible movie that I would never recommend to anyone - unless of course you have a TON of time to waste and absolutely nothing else to do. Review Title: I Watched It Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/09/25 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Casey Nolan'], 'Producers': ['Casey Nolan'], 'Starring': ['Casey Nolan', 'Tanner McBride'], 'Studio': ['MindSeed Productions']} Review Text: I actually watched the entire movie. Most of it is silly. I hate it when the so-called paranormal experts use a voice-box and struggle to make sense of the string of words. They ALL do it and that's just stupid. And the over-acting and "real" footage was a waste of time. At least it's not as bad as Ghost Adventures - thus I gave them 2 stars. If you have time to waste like I did, great. If you're looking for a movie of substance - forget it, you're not going to find it in this movie. Review Title: Time Wasted Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: These Final Hours Review Date: 2020/11/01 Categories: Science Fiction, Suspense, Serious, Tense Product Description: ['A self-obsessed young man makes his way to the party-to-end-all-parties on the last day on Earth, but ends up saving the life of a little girl searching for her father. Their relationship ultimately leads him on the path to redemption.'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zak Hilditch'], 'Producers': ['Liz Kearney'], 'Starring': ['Nathan Phillips', 'Angourie Rice', 'Jessica De Gouw']} Review Text: I really enjoyed it a lot. This movie gives you a lot to think about when it's over. I think most people won't like this movie because it doesn't have a happy ending, but the fact is, in real life, REAL happy endings are few and far between.

This is exactly what it would be like if we were hit like this. Scary, yes, depressing, yes, but it is true to life so there you have it. Well done. Glad I saw it and will recommend it to friends if they're up for a fun movie night. Review Title: Fun Movie! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of this purchase history reveals a strong preference for engaging narratives across a variety of genres, particularly science fiction and fantasy, with a notable interest in character-driven plots that evoke emotional responses. The individual tends to rate high-quality productions favorably, suggesting a keen appreciation for well-executed storytelling and production values, yet exhibits critical evaluation of less impactful offerings, reflecting a discerning taste.

Common themes indicate a favoring of films that combine suspense and drama, especially those that challenge conventional happy endings, hinting at a deeper resonance with realistic or thought-provoking content. The consumer shows sensitivity to narrative coherence and character development, often expressing disappointment with films perceived as cliches or poorly executed.

In terms of quality, there is a clear preference for well-crafted films, as evidenced by numerous high ratings, contrasted by harsh critiques of those perceived as subpar. Price sensitivity is not overtly highlighted but does suggest that the value for experience and quality is prioritized over mere cost.

Overall, this individual displays a balanced blend of optimism for engaging stories, critical judgment towards overly sentimental or cliché narratives, and a deep engagement with the thematic depth of films they consume.
